thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 4 of 44
thread.title: Alexander Vollmer

author: Alexander Vollmer
title: Alexander Vollmer
text:
This was my first serious espresso machine purchasing experience. To the novice the amount of information and products to sort through seems overwhelming. I consistently found the content on the WholeLatteLove website (esp. the videos) to be very helpful for get an understanding of the landscape.
After I did my research I called up a sales representative and had a very honest conversation about the products I had in mind. He offered some alternative suggestions (all less expensive than what I had in mind) and the end result has been fantastic. I couldn't be happier with how the entire experience was.
